titleStmt.title: Englands looking in and out Presented to the High Court of Parliament now assembled. By the author R.M. Knight.
titleStmt.author: Maddison, Ralph, Sir.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Badger for H. Mosley, and are to be sold at his shop at the Princes Armes in Saint Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: R.M. = Ralph Maddison, whose name appears on a3r.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
Appears at UMI microfilm "Early English books, 1475-1640" reel 850 and at UMI microfilm "Early English books, 1641-1700" reel 260 (same copy filmed twice).

place.placeName: his shop at the Princes Armes in Saint Pauls Church-yard
